OHOS::Paint¶

Overview¶

Related Modules:

Graphic

Description:

Defines the basic styles of graphs drawn on canvases.

Since:

1.0

Version:

1.0

Summary¶

Public Types¶

Public Type Name

Description

PaintStyle { STROKE_STYLE = 1, FILL_STYLE, STROKE_FILL_STYLE }

Enumerates paint styles of a closed graph. The styles are invalid for non-closed graphs.

Description
